attributes.action: Disallow the use of "data collectors" for Energy Performance Certificate work
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I petition the Government to ban the use of Data Collectors for all Energy Performance Certificate work and in particular for residential sales and the private sector landlords.

With approx 12,000 accredited Domestic Energy Assessors (DEA's) in the UK now there is no justification for Data Collectors to be trained and used when there is already insufficient work for the existing DEA's to do.

Energy performance Certificates should be carried out by DEA's only and no one else.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Disallow the use of "data collectors" for Energy Performance Certificate work."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page17813


Prime Minister's Office
